item.title: Detecting browser anomalies to disrupt attacks early
item.description: Detecting browser anomalies is crucial for early identification and prevention of cyber threats, preventing data breaches and attacks by monitoring for unexpected browser activities. Browser anomaly detections can spot unusual session activities, preventing attackers from impersonating legitimate users. During Adversary-in-the-Middle attacks, it helps to identify unauthorized interceptions of a session cookie which can be used to gain access to user credentials.
